Uses of Class
GameModel.Item

  • Packages that use Item 
    Package Description
    GameModel  

    • Uses of Item in GameModel

      Subclasses of Item in GameModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Armor
      Armor is a subclass of item as well as equipable.
      class  Bomb
      Bombs are room-dependent items.
      class  Consumable
      Superclass for unequippable items whose use methods only effect the player.
      class  Equipable
      Equipable is an abstract subclass of Item that a Player can equip which will grant bonuses to the Player's combat statistics
      class  LargeHealthPot
      A large healing potion.
      class  MediumHealthPot
      A medium healing potion.
      class  SmallHealthPot
      A small healing potion.
      class  SunWand
      A Sun Wand is used to change the light of a room.
      class  Weapon
      Weapon is a subclass of Equipable and Item.
      Methods in GameModel that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item Player.dropItem(java.lang.String itemName)
      Searches for an item in the player's inventory and equip slots based on a passed item name.
      Item Exit.getKey()
      Returns the Item that has been set as the key for this Exit
      Item Player.hasItem(java.lang.String itemName)
      Overrides Character's hasItem method().
      Item Character.hasItem(java.lang.String itemName)
      Checks the Character's inventory for an Item matching the name passed and returns the Item object if found, returns null if no Item was found
      Item Area.hasItem(java.lang.String itemName)
      Check if the room has an Item.
      Item Area.removeItem(java.lang.String itemName)
      Remove an Item from this Area.
      Methods in GameModel that return types with arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Item> Character.getInventory()
      Returns the Character's inventory
      java.util.Iterator<Item> Area.getItems()
      Get an Iterator of all items that are contained in the Area.
      Methods in GameModel with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Area.addItem(Item i)
      Add an Item to the Area.
      void Character.giveItem(Item i)
      Adds the passed Item to the Character's inventory
      void Area.putItem(Item i)
      Place an item into the Area.
      boolean Area.removeItem(Item i)
      Remove an item from this Area.
      Direction Area.unlockDoor(Item i)
      Attempt to unlock a door.
      Constructors in GameModel with parameters of type Item 
      Constructor and Description
      Exit(boolean b, Item i)
      Default constructor.
